import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import Layout from '../components/layout' import StructureTweet from '../components/tweet/index' import styles from './index.module.css' import Photo from '../components/photo' import * as ICON from '../components/icons' import IconButton from '../components/icon-button' import formatDistanceToNowStrict from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNowStrict' function Index() { const date= new Date() const name='Username' const mention='Mention' const untilNow = formatDistanceToNowStrict(date) var sayi=Math.floor(Math.random()*20) return (
{/* BAŞLA */}
{name} @{mention} • {untilNow}

MERHABA

5
{sayi}
{/* BİTİR */}
) } export default Index
